Detailed Description

template<class Data, class SetsType>
class Essential< Data, SetsType >

Functor representing the predicate being frequent essential.

This functor test if an itemset is frequent and essential. This functor process the support and the disjunction before pruning. We suppose that the data has the same internal encoding than the candidates (ie, the first item met is recoded in "0", the second in "1", ...).

The methods of this predicate are specific to tries data structure (PTree for the candiates and Tatree for the transactions). For the moment, this functor can only be used when using a levelwise exploration of the search space (Apriori) since it checks for subsets already generated.

The template parameter Data is the type of the transactional database. The template parameter SetsType is the type of the items.
